dataset_description.Acknowledgements: This work was supported by the Universiti Sains Malaysia (USM).
dataset_description.HowToAcknowledge: Cite this data, the study in the references section and consider including the following message: 'This data was obtained from the OpenNeuro database. Its accession number is '
Funding: The study has been funded by the USM Research Grant for Fundamental Neuroscience–Neurobehaviour (BrainReward and Anti-Reward) (1002/CNEURO/910114) and USM Research University Grant (1001.PPSP.812189)
ReferencesAndLinks: Mustapha, M., Rani, N. S. A., Reza, M. F., Wan Daud, W. N., & Ghani, M. A. A. (2016). Neurotechnological Advances in Exploring Melodic Recitation of the Noble Quran: Uncovering the Neural Circuitry in the Human Brain. 229-235. doi:10.1007/978-981-287-778-9_15. (Springer)
